title: DEI dies in darkness, taking integrity with it
description: By the end of 2024, I knew my days as an editor-in-chief were likely numbered. Not because I was a poor performer, or because of any issue with my parent company. In fact, our relationship was, and still is, quite good. I’d been editor-in-chief for nearly four years at HuffPost and had a track record...
